General.Name: Lupaka Gold Corp.
General.Description: Lupaka Gold Corp., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral resource properties. It holds interest in the Idol City, Pine Creek, and Red Mountain projects located in the state of Oregon, the United States. The company was formerly known as Kcrok Enterprises Ltd. and changed its name to Lupaka Gold Corp. in May 2010. Lupaka Gold Corp. was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in North Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1569 Dempsey Road, North Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7K 1S8
